scripts.build:win: rm -rf dist && pkg . && mkdir -p dist releases && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp .env.example dist/.env.example && cp points.txt dist/points.txt && cp earnings.txt dist/earnings.txt && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && rm -f releases/streamelements-goal-tracker-win-$VERSION.zip && (cd dist && npx bestzip "../releases/streamelements-goal-tracker-win-$VERSION.zip" .)
